name: Notion Learning
overview:
Notion Learning is a new low cost learning management system.

The platform is designed to allow non-technical users to develop e-learning content right in their web browser and then deploy it to hundreds of learners, all for a low monthly subscription rate.

Users can add content from the web as well as uploading there own files such as videos and documents as well as developing assessments.
